sentences.english: He is only a petty official.

sentences.english: They take a big shot at those corrupted officials.

definition: imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
county magistrate (during Tang to Qing times)
senior provincial official in imperial China
high-ranking officials in the court of a Chinese emperor
